meanings.sent1: The unquelled storm raged on, refusing to calm down.
meanings.sent2: Her unquelled determination led her to achieve her goals.
meanings.sent3: The unquelled puppy kept running around the house, full of energy.
meanings.sent4: His unquelled spirit soared high, never giving up despite the challenges.
meanings.sent5: The unquelled fire burned brightly, never dimming its intensity.

meanings.sent1: The unquelled child continued to cry, unable to be comforted.
meanings.sent2: The unquelled sea roared with waves crashing against the shore.
meanings.sent3: The unquelled baby refused to sleep, keeping the parents awake all night.
meanings.sent4: Her unquelled anger simmered beneath the surface, ready to erupt at any moment.
meanings.sent5: The unquelled crowd grew louder and more restless, demanding to be heard.
